analysis.description:
SafeMath.safeMul (/unique_chucks/31/0x06b9737a7a625478fe5a65bf4bff4390ff6ace96.sol#66-77) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(_x == 0 || z / _x == _y)
	- assert(bool)(_x == 0 || z / _x == _y)
